name: Grow Your Own Civilization
description:
Grow Your Own Civilization!

The Goal of the game is to grow your civilizaiton through the different phases until you can can launch a rocket to the moon. To do so, you need to build different land pieces using the resources you already have on the board. Find a way to grow your civilization to the space age!

Basic Game Flow

  1. Select a build from the left hand panel by clicking on it.
  2. When the next panel appears. Click on the white and blue squares to enable selection mode.
  3. Select a tile that matches the materials needed
  4. Repeat until all materials match
  5. Finally, select a build location from the hexes used for materials
  6. Click the build button and see your creation come to life. 
  7. Repeat!

Developers Note:

This game was built as a part of the Kenny Game Jam 2022. This is my first game jam as a solo dev and using Unity so there is definitely some bugs in the game, but overall I'm happy with the result.
